channel.title: Are The Whonix 14 TemplateVMs still necessary?
channel.description:
Hi there
sorry if this post doesn't fit into this forum, but I've recently installed Qubes, which installed with Whonix 14. Quickly I realized Whonix 14 wasn't supported anymore, so I followed the wiki guide to upgrade to Whonix 15.
Now, however, I have around 5 GB of space wasted by Whonix 14, which I don't even use anymore.
Is there a reason for me to keep Whonix 14, and if not, how can I delete it?
Thanks for reading this

item.title: Are The Whonix 14 TemplateVMs still necessary?
item.dc:creator: suferanto
item.description:
Thank you, Patrick!
This worked very well and I feel like I learned a lot!

Read full topic
item.source: Are The Whonix 14 TemplateVMs still necessary?

item.title: Are The Whonix 14 TemplateVMs still necessary?
item.dc:creator: tatertot
item.description:
They aren’t supported anymore, so might as well.
sudo rpm -e qubes-template-whonix-gw-14
sudo rpm -e qubes-template-whonix-ws-14

Read full topic
item.source: Are The Whonix 14 TemplateVMs still necessary?
